item.title: Texas megachurch founder Robert Morris pleads guilty to child sex abuse charges
item.description: Authorities say a Texas megachurch founder has pleaded guilty to lewd and indecent acts with a child after he was accused of sexually abusing a young ...

item.title: Trump administration taps Army Reserve and National Guard for temporary immigration judges
item.description: The Trump administration is tapping National Guard and Army Reserve lawyers to be temporary immigration judges after firing dozens of existing judges

item.title: Fundraiser for family of Michigan church gunman raises more than $275,000
item.description: A fundraiser for the family members of the man who opened fire in a Michigan church and set it ablaze has raised over $275,000

item.title: ACLU seeks release of Michigan immigrant held in custody despite life-threatening leukemia
item.description: Lawyers say federal authorities are keeping a Michigan man in custody in a deportation case, despite his life-threatening leukemia
